faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Find answers to common questions below.

q1.question: Is 123LegalDoc a law firm?
q1.answer: No, 123LegalDoc is a software platform and does not provide legal advice. We recommend consulting a qualified attorney for specific legal needs.

q2.question: How accurate are the AI suggestions?
q2.answer: Our AI is trained on common legal scenarios but suggestions are informational. Always review the chosen document type.

q3.question: Can I use documents in any U.S. state?
q3.answer: Many documents are general, but some have state-specific clauses. Select the relevant state in Step 1 for best results.

q4.question: How much does it cost?
q4.answer: We offer simple pay-per-document pricing at $5, bundles, and an unlimited plan. See our Pricing page for details.

q5.question: Is my information secure?
q5.answer: Yes, we use encryption and follow industry best practices to protect your data. See our Privacy Policy.

q6.question: What if I need help?
q6.answer: You can visit our Support page or contact us through the provided channels for assistance with the platform.
